channel.title: Block players from logging in without a name
channel.description:
Ugh annoys me, they dc but it spams the command prompt with errors.
Is there a way to block them from logging in? like saying invalid instantly clientside?

item.title: Block players from logging in without a name
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:1, topic:329247”]Ugh annoys me, they dc but it spams the command prompt with errors.

Is there a way to block them from logging in? like saying invalid instantly clientside?[/quote]

Try switching ports
